data.name: labelControl1.Text
data.value: You have completed the tutorial! Thank you for taking the time to try out File Me - we sincerely appreciate it. Now, some tid bits! Closing File Me When you close File Me by pressing the X button it will be minimised to the Windows tray. To close it completely right click the tray icon and select Exit. Features Here are some other things that you can do with File Me (some of these are only available with a full licence!): • Filing: ◦ Drag a folder onto a filing tile - the folder and all of its contents will be filed. ◦ Drag an Outlook e-mail onto a filing tile - the e-mail will be filed as a message file. ▪ If File Attachments is ticked in the Filer's options the e-mails attachments will be filed individually instead. ◦ Drag multiple files onto a filing tile. ◦ View the status and progress of files which are being filed or which have completed filing - accessible via the green arrow button at the bottom of the view. - Grouping / Categorisation: ◦ Filers are grouped according to their Group property. ◦ Categories can be added to the left pane by clicking the small + button at the bottom • Importing / Exporting: ◦ Filers can be imported from and exported to JSON from the right click menu of a tile. This is useful when moving between computers. • Additional Options: ◦ The cog wheel at the bottom of the view will take you to the options window. Here you can: ▪ Change the theme. ▪ Change the size of filing tiles. ▪ Setup a global hotkey to show File Me at any time. Licencing:

data.name: labelControl2.Text
data.value: Closing File Me When you close File Me by pressing the X button it will be minimised to the Windows tray. To close it completely right click the tray icon and select Exit. Features Here are some other things that you can do with File Me (some of these are only available with a full licence!): • Filing: ◦ Drag a folder onto a filing tile - the folder and all of its contents will be filed. ◦ Drag an Outlook e-mail onto a filing tile - the e-mail will be filed as a message file. ▪ If File Attachments is ticked in the Filer's options the e-mails attachments will be filed individually instead. ◦ Drag multiple files onto a filing tile. ◦ View the status and progress of files which are being filed or which have completed filing - accessible via the green arrow button at the bottom of the view. - Grouping / Categorisation: ◦ Filers are grouped according to their Group property. ◦ Categories can be added to the left pane by clicking the small + button at the bottom • Importing / Exporting: ◦ Filers can be imported from and exported to JSON from the right click menu of a tile. This is useful when moving between computers. • Additional Options: ◦ The cog wheel at the bottom of the view will take you to the options window. Here you can: ▪ Change the theme. ▪ Change the size of filing tiles. ▪ Setup a global hotkey to show File Me at any time. Licencing:
